title: Ticket #7633: Startd history bindings should check version for support
description:
Calling condor_history -startd on a Startd that doesn't support remote history calls presents the user with the helpful message: 

[jcpatton@submit ~]$ condor_history -startd -name "oldstartd.chtc.wisc.edu" -limit 1
 ID     OWNER          SUBMITTED   RUN_TIME     ST COMPLETED   CMD
The version of the startd does not support remote history

(Though minor annoyance, there is no line return at the end of the error message.)

Doing the same in the python bindings presents the user with a less useful error message in the raised RuntimeError exception:

RuntimeError: Failed to end classad message.

A more descriptive error message would be better here. Perhaps we can check the condor version and determine beforehand if startd history calls are supported.
creator: jpatton
